comment._content: "Joseph Sherman Frelinghuysen, Sr. (March 12, 1869 – February 8, 1948) represented New Jersey as a Republican in the United States Senate from 1917 to 1923." en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Joseph_Sherman_Frelinghuysen,_Sr..
